manifest.title: Firefly III
manifest.author: Firefly III Authors
manifest.description:
### About

A free and open source personal finance manager

"Firefly III" is a self-hosted financial manager. It can help you keep track of expenses, income, budgets and everything in between. It supports credit cards, shared household accounts and savings accounts. Itâ€™s pretty fancy. You should use it to save and organise money. 

### Features

* Full financial management
* JSON REST API
* Reports in many flavours
* Import data from other sources
manifest.changelog:
* Update firefly-iii to 6.4.18
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii/releases/tag/v6.4.18)
* [Discussion 11671](https://github.com/orgs/firefly-iii/discussions/11671) (Subscriptions Next Expected Match) started by [@idgaron](https://github.com/idgaron)  
* [Issue 11667](https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii/issues/11667) (Account names and numbers are not corrected in rules when the account is updated) reported by [@Kage1](https://github.com/Kage1)  
* [Issue 11668](https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii/issues/11668) (Auto-budget cron crashes on develop: Call to a member function budgets() on null (BudgetLimitRepository.php:311)) reported by [@sykmer](https://github.com/sykmer)

update_feeds.command: echo '==> cron' && sudo -u www-data -E php /app/code/artisan firefly-iii:cron

register-admin.message: On first visit, an admin (site owner) account needs to be created
